Class MultimediaPurlHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.naturalis.purl.rest.AbstractPurlHandler
      • nl.naturalis.purl.rest.MultimediaPurlHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PurlHandler

    public class MultimediaPurlHandler
extends AbstractPurlHandler
    A PurlHandler capable of handling PURLs for multimedia objects.
    Author:
    Ayco Holleman

        protected javax.ws.rs.core.Response doHandle()

        Description copied from class: AbstractPurlHandler
